title: Arumukha nAthan pOl aDiyArai
sahitya:
Arumukha nAthan pOl aDiyArai Adarikkum shIruDaiyOr ippAril vEru yArumillaiyE


anupallavi

  vAri aruT-koDai tarum Ariru karam uDaiyOn vAri enai karuNai mAri shoriyum uLam uDaiyOn


caraNam    shiraiyil irundu sUranAl shIrazhinda dEvarukku parindu aruL purindu perum shIr peTravan
kurai niraindE uLLam varundi vADum anbarai karai Etrik-kAkkum karuNaikkIDu aTravan
